channel.title: Spiritscape Souls Developement
channel.description:
[center]Spiritscape Soul[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i131.photobucket.com/albums/p284/Money_Maker_photos/soul.jpg[/img][/center]
Whats up ya'll after getting bored of doing nothing after school i decided i want to learn some more java. I got a winterlove source and am now using it for Spiritscape Soul.
Heres what i've done over the past few days:
Started working on Server. September 16 2007 50% Runecrafting works(only in abyss). September 16 2007 Levelup Handler. September 16 2007 Commandhandler. September 16 2007 Announcement GUI September 16 2007 changed 50% runecrafting to 90% September 20 2007
What i'm planning on doing:
Make 100% runecrafting Make talismans teleport you the altar when used on ruins and zammy mage tele to abyss adding a banhandler. Castle Wars, Pest Control, Home-made mini-games, cooking handler, combat handler, All skills working 100% like rs, add a couple spiritscape twists =P Add wilderness ( may need help with this in the future) Magic handler. Adding Global objects handled
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Will add more to that list.
also i want to code a client with an amazing game frame and very interesting models =)
The client will come last.
I may need help with the client so i may hire client coders, afterwards.
When I'm hoping to release around christmas time.
If anyone would like to assist me in coding please fill out this application: [code] Moparscape Name : Age : MSN/Yahoo : How long have you been coding for? : do you know any other coding besides java? : Have you coded any other servers: [/code]
I will post several videos on the server such as runecrafting once I'm done.
Thanx for reading =)
Please feel free to add me on msn Money_MakerADMIN@hotmail.com

item.title: Spiritscape Souls Developement
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

[center]Spiritscape Soul[/center]

[center][/center]

Whats up ya’ll after getting bored of doing nothing after school i decided i want to learn some more java. I got a winterlove source and am now using it for Spiritscape Soul.

Heres what i’ve done over the past few days:

50% Runecrafting works(only in abyss). September 16 2007

changed 50% runecrafting to 90% September 20 2007

adding a banhandler.
